content:
StatePersistenceAttribute Class

Definition

Indicates whether actor state should be volatile (in-memory only), persisted, or not stored at all. The store type given to this attribute must match the type of state provider used in the actor service.

In this Article

[System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class)]
public sealed class StatePersistenceAttribute : Attribute
Inheritance
Attribute
StatePersistenceAttribute
Attributes
System.AttributeUsage

Constructors

StatePersistenceAttribute(StatePersistence)

Creates an instance of StatePersistenceAttribute

Properties

StatePersistence

Get or sets the enum representing type of state store to use for the actor.
